text: Battlefield V is a first-person shooter game made by DICE and published by Electronic Arts. It is the sixteenth game in the Battlefield series and the successor to 2016's Battlefield 1, it was released for Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 4 and Xbox One on November 20, 2018. ==References== Category:2018 video games Category:Battlefield Category:Battle royale games Category:Electronic Arts video games Category:First-person shooters Category:Multiplayer and single-player video games Category:Pacific War video games Category:PlayStation 4 games Category:Video games developed in Sweden Category:Video games set in France Category:Video games set in Greece Category:Video games set in the United States Category:Windows games Category:World War II video games Category:Xbox One games
title: Battlefield V
